property.name: Rules
property.value: Put an Abyssal ally token with 6 ATK / 6 health into play. Ongoing: Destroy two Bloods Put an Abyssal ally token with 6 ATK / 6 health into play. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Magtheridon deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally.; If Magtheridon is Unleashed, gain a Blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each raiding player removes his hand from the game. At the end of your next turn, put each card removed this way into its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Destroy Blood Siphon > Draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Destroy Broken Hopes > Destroy target ability or equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.; Magtheridon deals 1 melee damage to its controller's hero for each Blood in play.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy an ability, ready ally, and equipment controlled by target raiding player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dark Mending Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.; [Activate] > Dark Mending Channeler heals all damage from target friendly ally. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each raiding player, destroy up to one target ability, ally, or equipment he controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Demonic Fury enters play exhausted.; Ongoing: [Activate] > You pay 2 less to play your next card this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only of seven or more Bloods are in play.; Raiding players destroy an ability, ally, or equipment they control for each Blood in play.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raiding players put 15 damage divided as they choose on any number of heroes and/or allies in their parties, putting no more than fatal damage on each character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Untargetable; Magtheridon can't attack or be dealt damage.; When the last Channeler leaves your party or you place your fifth resource, flip Magtheridon.; BACK: When Magtheridon flips to this side, put five cubes into play, gain a Blood, and say, "I am UNLEASHED!" Put Magtheridon's Lair into play on the Coolsown side and swap this card with Unleashed Magtheridon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Magtheridon has +1 ATK while attacking for each Blood in play.; When the tenth Blood enters play, flip Magtheridon.; BACK: Magtheridon has +2 ATK while attacking for each Blood in play.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: When Magtheridon's Lair flips to this side, put 2 damage on each hero and ally with an attached Cube, then detach all Cubes.; At the end of your turn, flip Magtheridon's Lair.; BACK: At the start of your turn, if one or more Cubes are unattached, Magtheridon deals 10 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. At the end of your turn, flip Magtheridon's Lair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target an ally. You may target an additional ally for each Blood in play. Magtheridon deals X melee damage to each of those allies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust a hero or ally in your party > Attach this Cube to that character while that character remains exhausted. Only a raiding player can use this power, and only on his turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero or ally, and Magtheridon deals 4 fire damage to it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if fifteen or more Bloods are in play.As an additional cost to play, exhaust Magtheridon.One Fel Swoop can't be interrupted.Magtheridon deals 30 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a number. Destroy all opposing abilities, allies, and equipment with cost equal to that number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Magtheridon is Unleashed.Destroy a Blood This turn, Magtheridon can't be targeted by raiding players, and your cards can't be interrupted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Magtheridon is Unleashed.When Magtheridon deals combat damage to a hero or ally, he also deals that much damage to a second target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each Blood in play.Destroy a Blood Put Power Returns into your hand. Use only if Power Returns is in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy an opposing ability or equipment for each Blood in play.When an opposing card or effect causes you to discard Rampant Destruction, you may put it from your graveyard into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Ready Magtheridon. He can't attack the same hero more than once this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Target raiding player chooses whether you put them into your hand or graveyard. If he chooses the graveyard, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.3, Shadow Channeler deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in target raiding player's party. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.3, Shadow Channeler deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in target raiding player's party. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sow Destruction enters play with a curse counter for each Blood in play.Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a curse counter on Sow Destruction, and then Magtheridon deals fire damage equal to the number of curse counters to the opposing hero with the least damage. You settle ties.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if seven or more Bloods are in play.Remove all damage from target opposing hero and put it on a second target hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust twp target opposing allies. Each deals melee damage equal to its ATK to the other ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Summoner Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.3, Put an Abyssal ally token with 6 ATK / 6 health into play. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.3, Shadow Channeler deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in target raiding player's party. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if one or more Bloods are in play. Destroy target opposing ally, and its controller chooses a second raiding player. That player destroys one of his resources and chooses a third raiding player. That player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Opposing allies enter play exhausted.Exhaust target ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if one or more Bloods are in play.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Magtheridon deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally.Ongoing: When Magtheridon becomes exhausted, he deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: When Magtheridon is dealt damage, he deals 1 melee damage to the source of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust an opposing ally for each card above seven in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.
